death_place.en: Koo Foundation Sun Yat-Sen Cancer Center

description.zh-cn: 台湾国际法权威、国立台湾大学退休教授，台湾独立运动的代表性领袖之一，曾代表民主进步党参选1996年中华民国总统选举，被称为“台独教父”。
description.en: A Taiwanese authority on international law, retired professor at National Taiwan University, and a leading figure in the Taiwan independence movement. He represented the Democratic Progressive Party in the 1996 Republic of China presidential election and is known as the 'Godfather of Taiwan Independence'.

description.zh-cn: 由彭明敏、谢聪敏、魏廷朝于1964年共同起草的文件，主要内容为“反攻大陆”绝对不可能，并要求制定新宪法及建立新国家。
description.en: A document drafted by Peng Ming-min, Hsieh Tsung-min, and Wei Ting-chao in 1964, which argued that 'counterattacking the mainland' was impossible and called for a new constitution and the establishment of a new state.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾与彭明敏、魏廷朝共同起草《台湾自救运动宣言》。
description.en: A Taiwanese political figure who co-authored the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation' with Peng Ming-min and Wei Ting-chao.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾与彭明敏、谢聪敏共同起草《台湾自救运动宣言》。
description.en: A Taiwanese political figure who co-authored the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation' with Peng Ming-min and Hsieh Tsung-min.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的执政党，在彭明敏发表《台湾自救运动宣言》后将其逮捕并判刑。
description.en: The ruling party of the Republic of China, which arrested and sentenced Peng Ming-min after he published the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，彭明敏在国立台湾大学时期的好友。两人在1996年总统选举中成为竞争对手。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China and a close friend of Peng Ming-min during their time at National Taiwan University. They became rivals in the 1996 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，于2000年邀请彭明敏出任总统府资政。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China who invited Peng Ming-min to serve as a Senior Advisor to the President in 2000.

en: Senior Advisor to the President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府的高级顾问职位。
description.en: A senior advisory position in the Office of the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，彭明敏曾于1995年加入，并代表该党参选1996年总统选举。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan. Peng Ming-min joined in 1995 and represented the party in the 1996 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的顶尖研究型大学，彭明敏于此毕业并长期任教，曾担任政治系主任。
description.en: A top research university in Taiwan where Peng Ming-min graduated and taught for a long time, serving as the chair of the Department of Political Science.

description.zh-cn: 位于法国巴黎的大学，彭明敏于1954年在此取得法学博士学位。
description.en: A university in Paris, France, from which Peng Ming-min obtained his doctorate in law in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 位于加拿大蒙特利尔的大学，彭明敏于1953年在此取得国际航空法硕士学位。
description.en: A university in Montreal, Canada, from which Peng Ming-min obtained his master's degree in International Air Law in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 日本曾存在的一所大学，彭明敏曾在此就读法学部政治科。
description.en: A former university in Japan where Peng Ming-min studied in the political science division of the Faculty of Law.

description.zh-cn: 旨在建立一个主权独立的台湾共和国的政治运动，彭明敏是此运动的代表性领袖之一。
description.en: A political movement to establish a sovereign and independent Taiwanese republic. Peng Ming-min is one of its representative leaders.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，在其任内彭明敏因《台湾自救运动宣言》被捕，后又获其特赦。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, during whose tenure Peng Ming-min was arrested for the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation' and later granted a special pardon by him.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏的父亲，医师，曾任高雄市参议会第一任议长。
description.en: Peng Ming-min's father, a physician who served as the first speaker of the Kaohsiung City Council.

description.zh-cn: 美国传教士，在彭明敏计划逃离台湾时提供了重要联系帮助。
description.en: An American missionary who provided crucial contact assistance when Peng Ming-min was planning his escape from Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 日本台独运动人士，制作假护照协助彭明敏于1970年逃离台湾。
description.en: A Japanese activist in the Taiwan independence movement who created a fake passport to help Peng Ming-min escape from Taiwan in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统。2019年，彭明敏与吴澧培、李远哲、高俊明联名发表公开信，劝其放弃竞选连任。
description.en: President of the Republic of China. In 2019, Peng Ming-min, along with Wu Li-pei, Lee Yuan-tseh, and Kao Chun-ming, published an open letter urging her not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 前中华民国总统府资政，与彭明敏等人联名劝退蔡英文竞选连任。
description.en: Former Senior Advisor to the President of the Republic of China, who co-signed a letter with Peng Ming-min and others urging Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 前中央研究院院长，与彭明敏等人联名劝退蔡英文竞选连任。
description.en: Former President of Academia Sinica, who co-signed a letter with Peng Ming-min and others urging Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾基督长老教会牧师，与彭明敏等人联名劝退蔡英文竞选连任。
description.en: A pastor of the Presbyterian Church in Taiwan, who co-signed a letter with Peng Ming-min and others urging Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家与政治评论家，在彭明敏被特赦后少数仍敢与他来往的朋友之一。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer and political commentator, one of the few friends who dared to associate with Peng Ming-min after his special pardon.

description.zh-cn: 前中央研究院院长，曾支持并帮助彭明敏获得麦吉尔大学的奖学金。
description.en: Former President of Academia Sinica, who supported and helped Peng Ming-min obtain a scholarship to McGill University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国首次总统直接选举，彭明敏代表民主进步党参选，最终由中国国民党提名的李登辉胜选。
description.en: The first direct presidential election in the Republic of China. Peng Ming-min ran as the candidate for the Democratic Progressive Party, ultimately losing to the Kuomintang's nominee, Lee Teng-hui.

en: Koo Foundation Sun Yat-Sen Cancer Center

description.zh-cn: 位于台北市北投区的癌症专科医院，为彭明敏逝世地点。
description.en: A cancer specialty hospital in Beitou District, Taipei City, where Peng Ming-min passed away.

description.zh-cn: 1948年毕业于国立台湾大学政治系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Political Science at National Taiwan University in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 1953年获得麦吉尔大学国际航空法硕士学位。
description.en: Obtained a master's degree in International Air Law from McGill University in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 1954年获得巴黎大学法学博士学位。
description.en: Obtained a Doctor of Law degree from the University of Paris in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 曾就读于东京帝国大学法学部政治科，1945年肄业。
description.en: Studied in the Political Science Division of the Faculty of Law at Tokyo Imperial University, leaving in 1945.

position.en: Chair of the Department of Political Science

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏曾在国立台湾大学任教，并于1961年出任政治学系系主任。
description.en: Peng Ming-min taught at National Taiwan University and became the Chair of the Department of Political Science in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 在陈水扁总统任内，彭明敏于2000年至2008年担任总统府资政。
description.en: During President Chen Shui-bian's tenure, Peng Ming-min served as a Senior Advisor to the Office of the President from 2000 to 2008.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，新任总统陈水扁邀请彭明敏出任总统府资政。
description.en: In 2000, newly elected President Chen Shui-bian invited Peng Ming-min to serve as a Senior Advisor to the Office of the President.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏于1995年加入民主进步党，并代表该党参选总统，后于1997年退党。
description.en: Peng Ming-min joined the Democratic Progressive Party in 1995 and represented it in the presidential election, before leaving the party in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 1964年，彭明敏与谢聪敏、魏廷朝共同起草《台湾自救运动宣言》。
description.en: In 1964, Peng Ming-min, along with Hsieh Tsung-min and Wei Ting-chao, drafted the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation'.

description.zh-cn: 1964年，谢聪敏与彭明敏、魏廷朝共同起草《台湾自救运动宣言》。
description.en: In 1964, Hsieh Tsung-min, along with Peng Ming-min and Wei Ting-chao, drafted the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation'.

description.zh-cn: 1964年，魏廷朝与彭明敏、谢聪敏共同起草《台湾自救运动宣言》。
description.en: In 1964, Wei Ting-chao, along with Peng Ming-min and Hsieh Tsung-min, drafted the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation'.

description.zh-cn: 因发表《台湾自救运动宣言》，彭明敏于1964年9月20日被中国国民党政府逮捕，后被判刑八年，直到1965年11月3日获特赦出狱。
description.en: For publishing the 'Declaration of Formosan Self-Salvation', Peng Ming-min was arrested by the Kuomintang government on September 20, 1964, and sentenced to eight years in prison. He was released under a special pardon on November 3, 1965.

description.zh-cn: 1965年11月3日，时任总统蒋介石特赦了彭明敏。
description.en: On November 3, 1965, then-President Chiang Kai-shek granted a special pardon to Peng Ming-min.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏与李登辉在国立台湾大学时期成为密友。
description.en: Peng Ming-min and Lee Teng-hui became close friends during their time at National Taiwan University.

description.zh-cn: 在1996年中华民国总统选举中，彭明敏与李登辉是主要的竞争对手。
description.en: In the 1996 Republic of China presidential election, Peng Ming-min and Lee Teng-hui were major political rivals.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏与作家李敖相识，在彭明敏被特赦后受到特务监视期间，李敖是少数仍敢与他来往的朋友。
description.en: Peng Ming-min was acquainted with writer Li Ao. After Peng's pardon, while under surveillance by secret agents, Li Ao was one of the few friends who dared to maintain contact with him.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏是台湾独立运动最具代表性的领袖之一，其思想与行动深刻影响了该运动。
description.en: Peng Ming-min is one of the most representative leaders of the Taiwan independence movement; his ideas and actions profoundly influenced the movement.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏是彭清靠的儿子。
description.en: Peng Ming-min is the son of Peng Ching-kao.

description.zh-cn: 美国传教士唐培礼协助彭明敏联系海外人士，促成了其在1970年的逃亡。
description.en: American missionary Milo L. Thornberry helped Peng Ming-min contact people overseas, facilitating his escape in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 日本台独运动人士宗像隆幸为彭明敏制作了假护照，帮助他成功逃离台湾。
description.en: Japanese Taiwan independence activist Munakata Takayuki created a fake passport for Peng Ming-min, helping him to successfully escape from Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 前中研院院长胡适支持彭明敏，并帮助他获得了在麦吉尔大学第二年的奖学金。
description.en: Former Academia Sinica President Hu Shih supported Peng Ming-min and helped him secure a scholarship for his second year at McGill University.

description.zh-cn: 2019年1月3日，彭明敏与吴澧培、李远哲、高俊明联名发表公开信，建请时任总统蔡英文放弃竞选连任。
description.en: On January 3, 2019, Peng Ming-min, along with Wu Li-pei, Lee Yuan-tseh, and Kao Chun-ming, published an open letter urging then-President Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 2019年1月3日，吴澧培与彭明敏、李远哲、高俊明联名发表公开信，建请时任总统蔡英文放弃竞选连任。
description.en: On January 3, 2019, Wu Li-pei, along with Peng Ming-min, Lee Yuan-tseh, and Kao Chun-ming, published an open letter urging then-President Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 2019年1月3日，李远哲与彭明敏、吴澧培、高俊明联名发表公开信，建请时任总统蔡英文放弃竞选连任。
description.en: On January 3, 2019, Lee Yuan-tseh, along with Peng Ming-min, Wu Li-pei, and Kao Chun-ming, published an open letter urging then-President Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 2019年1月3日，高俊明与彭明敏、吴澧培、李远哲联名发表公开信，建请时任总统蔡英文放弃竞选连任。
description.en: On January 3, 2019, Kao Chun-ming, along with Peng Ming-min, Wu Li-pei, and Lee Yuan-tseh, published an open letter urging then-President Tsai Ing-wen not to seek re-election.

description.zh-cn: 彭明敏于1923年8月15日出生于台中大甲。
description.en: Peng Ming-min was born in Dajia, Taichung on August 15, 1923.
